title: 2009/702/EC: Council Decision of 7 September 2009 appointing one Austrian member of the Committee of the Regions
header:
12.9.2009 EN Official Journal of the European Union L 241/8
COUNCIL DECISION
of 7 September 2009
appointing one Austrian member of the Committee of the Regions
(2009/702/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community, and in particular Article 263 thereof,
Having regard to the proposal of the Austrian Government,
Whereas:
(1) On 24 January 2006, the Council adopted Decision 2006/116/EC appointing the members and alternate members of the Committee of the Regions for the period from 26 January 2006 to 25 January 2010 (1).
(2) A member’s seat on the Committee of the Regions has become vacant following the resignation of Mr Erwin MOHR,
main_body:
The following is hereby reappointed to the Committee of the Regions as a member for the remainder of the current term of office, which runs until 25 January 2010:
Mr Erwin MOHR, Gemeinderat in Markt Wolfurt (change of mandate).
This Decision shall take effect on the day of its adoption.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 7 September 2009.
For the Council
The President
E. ERLANDSSON
(1)  OJ L 56, 25.2.2006, p. 75.
